game_description: place mindfulness - A calming, guided meditative experience in Virtual Reality (VR). Let our soothing guides take you on a relaxing journey into real world environments, shot in stunning 360 video. Practise mindfulness in a forest of Californian Redwoods or immerse yourself next to a peaceful stream in the Great Otway National Park. The choice is yours.
review_1: Not a bad app, but not great either. Downloading the movies takes a very long time and the app crashed several times before the download was complete, so I had to start all over again. The movies are pretty blurry and this hampers the experience
